english.segment1: What goes around, comes around. And I cant breathe. What holds me up is what holds me down. And I am more unstable than I seem
english.segment2: My heart is bare. Theres not much there
english.segment3: But I believe youve given me. More than I could know. But I know this. You are good
english.segment4: Ive fought the fight against myself. And Ive lost the fight again. My bodys broke from falling down. Just give me one more chance this time Ill win
english.segment5: My heart is bare. But I know that youre there
english.segment6: My eyes are weak I can barely see. A glimmer of your gold but its enough to know. You are good
english.segment7: And through it all youve given me. A peace that overflows. Oh how I know. That you are good
english.segment8: So good to me. You are good.
